Metadata: Physicochemical changes in Alaska Pollock surimi and surimi gel as affected by electron beam

Recently, these authors reported that electron beam could effectively inactivate "Staphylococcus aureus" in surimi seafood while retaining superior color and texture compared to thermal pasteurization. This work takes a closer look at changes in physicochemical properties of surimi and surimi gels upon varying doses of electron beam in relation to protein-protein interactions.
